issue.title: [Rust]: Support Dictionary types for ListArrays in arrow json reader
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10249](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10249). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, dictionary types for listarrays are not supported in Arrow JSON reader. It would be nice to add dictionary type support.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10249?focusedCommentId=17219420) by Jorge Leitão (jorgecarleitao):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8430
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8430>
